text: Uye musapokane nevanhu vegwaro (maJudha nemaKristu), kusara kwekuti zviri munzira iri nani (mashoko nenzira yakanaka kuvashevedzera kuIslaam), kusara kweavo vanoita zvakaipa kubva mavari. Uye taurai kuti (kwavari): “Tinotenda mune zvatakatumirwa nezvamakatumirwa, uye Mwari wedu naMwari wenyu mumwechete (Allah), uye kwavari tinozvipira (semaMuslim).”
